alert.note: Alert for Mesa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 19 at 12:26PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of west central Colorado and east central Utah, including Mesa County and the city of Gateway in west central Colorado. In east central Utah, portions of Grand County. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1221 PM MDT, gage reports indicated snowmelt. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gateway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
